# Autospectrum computation

**API Collection**

Compute the element-wise sum of the squares of the real and imaginary parts of a complex vector.

## Vector-to-Vector Spectra Computation

- **vDSP_zaspec**: Computes the autospectrum of a complex single-precision vector.
- **vDSP_zaspecD**: Computes the autospectrum of a complex double-precision vector.

## Vector-to-vector spectra and coherence computation

- **Cross-spectrum computation**: Compute the element-wise product of a vector and the conjugate of a second vector.
- **Coherence function computation**: Compute the coherence of two vectors.
